org.apache.poi.hssf.record

Interface Margin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BottomMarginRecord, LeftMarginRecord, RightMarginRecord, TopMarginRecord 

    public interface Margin
    The margin interface is a parent used to define left, right, top and bottom margins. This allows much of the code to be generic when it comes to handling margins.(${t_7af25175526b4679925e6302bc1f3d2f})

    • Method Summary

      Set the margin field for the Margin.(${t_1a04cb3e8d1a40c9964bfb742b0657cb})
